name: Outdoor Research Flurry Sensor Gloves - Men's
description: Warm, wool blend fabric and a snug fit make these gloves a just-right layer for multi-day trekking or shorter hikes that might get windy and cool. Touchscreen feature helps with map reading or capturing photos and the silicone print on the fingers helps you grip your gadgets.Made of Alpin-Wool™ Plus wool and synthetic blend.Soft fleece liner is cozy against the skin.Anti-slip silicone print on fingers and palm.Synthetic suede thumb and index tip are touch-screen compatible.Leather grab tab on inner wrist allows glove to be pulled on easily.
